titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 1372) to reauthorize the Export-Import Bank of the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-490, by Mrs. Myrick.
The resolution waives all points of order against the conference report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 167.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 433.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/4/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 1372 (U.S. Export-Import Bank reauthorization).
